    • Method Detail

      • endPane

        public static javafx.scene.layout.GridPane endPane()
        Displays the outcome of the game along with the leaderboard Two buttons are available, one to return to main menu and play again, another to review the state of the board when the game finished
        Returns:
        the gridPane to be displayed

      • gameOver

        protected static void gameOver()
        This method is called when the game is determined to be over. It starts off by waiting a few seconds then playing the end music Then calls the method writeLeaderBoard() from Class Leaderboard Finally the scene is set
